title: *UPCOMING 1X1 APT! TAKE A TOUR AT OUR BEAUTIFUL COMMUNITY TODAY! CALL!
posting_body: ['Classic Comfort with a Modern Twist', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x123', 'From $1,030', '.', '1 Bed 1 Bath .', '667 Sq.', 'Ft', '* Unit WAIT - Available Now', '* Unit 1200 - Available 08/07/22', '* Unit 1114 - Available 09/03/22', '* Unit 1116 - Available 09/07/22', 'Sterling Summerland', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '2300 Rock Springs Dr Las Vegas, NV 89128', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Find a spacious one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment in North Las Vegas at Sterling Summerland Apartment Homes.', 'In addition to air conditioning and an all-electric kitchen, this floor plan includes a breakfast bar, balcony or patio, and lots of extra storage space.', 'Enjoy access to the community fitness center, indoor and outdoor pools, and clubhouse, all with high-speed internet connections.', 'Call today to tour the available apartments.', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT\u2002 \u2002FEATURES', 'Breakfast Bar', 'Large Closets', 'Ceiling Fan', 'View', 'Patio', 'Balcony', 'Disposal', 'Dishwasher', 'Refrigerator', 'Cable', 'Air Conditioning', '9-Foot Ceilings', 'Window Coverings', 'Full Size Washer/Dryer in Unit', 'Full Size Washer/Dryer in Connections', 'LEASE\u2002\u2002TERMS', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Sunday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x123', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
